version_description:
Ski Jumping season update introduces cool new features!

• Several new courses
• Turn-based multiplayer with Game Center
• Deeper Social integration and Facebook enhancements
• Share in-game currency with friends
• More chances to get fr

• Several new courses
• Turn-based multiplayer with Game Center
• Deeper Social integration and Facebook enhancements
• Share in-game currency with friends

- General Bugfixes
- Daily random bonus coins for returning users
- Improved "tap" UI and improved visibility of circle on all tracks
- 3 new ski outfits
- New dynamic cameras
- Dynamically adjusted rendering for lower end devices

- General Bugfixes
- Daily random bonus coins for returning users
- Improved "tap" UI and improved visibility of circle on all tracks
- 3 new ski outfits
- New dynamic cameras
- Dynamically adjusted rendering for lower end devices

- Improved balancing
- Bug fixes

· Stunning new UI Art and design with a crisper and clearer appearance.
· 3 New Jumper outfits
· Facebook Integration with exclusive Facebook outfit
· Brand new Pro Control system
· Newly designed career

- 3 new ski outfits (TWIN TONE 77, VULCAN X1, SPEED DEMON)
- General Bugfixes
- An issue that sometimes after completing a cup a popup for the next cup would appear that could not be closed has been fixed.
- The game now leaves all training stats

- Improved balancing
- Bug fixes
